billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Provides that farmers shall receive an exemption from tolls when transporting product to N.Y. city for consumption in the city
summary: Provides that farmers shall receive an exemption from tolls when transporting product to NYC for consumption in the city.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          742

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  YOUNG, BONACIC -- read twice and ordered printed,
         and when printed to be committed to  the  Committee  on  Corporations,
         Authorities and Commissions

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the public authorities law, in relation to providing
         toll exemptions for farmers transporting their goods to New York city

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  public  authorities  law  is amended by adding a new
    2  section 2858 to read as follows:
    3    S 2858. EXEMPTIONS FROM TOLLS. 1. ANY  PUBLIC  AUTHORITY  UNDER  TITLE
    4  NINE  OF ARTICLE TWO, TITLE TWO OF ARTICLE THREE OR TITLE THREE OF ARTI-
    5  CLE THREE OF THIS CHAPTER, SHALL PROVIDE  AN  EXEMPTION  FROM  ANY  TOLL
    6  IMPOSED  BY  SUCH AUTHORITY FOR TRANSPORTATION ACROSS, ON OR THROUGH ANY
    7  BRIDGE, ROAD OR TUNNEL, FOR ANY FARMER OR FOOD PRODUCER WHO:
    8    A. FARMS OR PRODUCES FOOD, INCLUDING FISH  AND  FISH  PRODUCTS,  ON  A
    9  PROPERTY LOCATED IN THE STATE; AND
   10    B.  IS TRANSPORTING SUCH FOOD TO THE CITY OF NEW YORK FOR THE PURPOSES
   11  OF CONSUMPTION WITHIN SUCH CITY.
   12    2. ANY PERSON EXEMPT FROM A TOLL PURSUANT TO SUBDIVISION ONE  OF  THIS
   13  SECTION  SHALL  ALSO  BE  EXEMPT FROM ANY CONGESTION PRICING PLAN IMPLE-
   14  MENTED IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK.
   15    3. THE COMMISSIONER OF TRANSPORTATION SHALL ESTABLISH ACCEPTABLE FORMS
   16  OF PROOF TO SHOW THAT AN INDIVIDUAL DOES, IN  FACT,  COMPLY  WITH  PARA-
   17  GRAPHS A AND B OF SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS SECTION.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   19  it shall have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03433-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing toll exemptions for farmers transporting their goods to New York city
